duties_responsibilities.duty: Organize inventory and create safe and efficient stock areas
Receive, store, pick, count, and distribute products and material to meet store needs
Assemble, pack, and ship transfers of merchandise between retail locations or distribution centers
Maintain a neat and orderly stock room and practice safety consciousness and security measures to deter theft
Replenish and display products on the sales floor and organize them according to Visual Merchandising standards
Greet customers, direct them to products, answer questions, and offer current product knowledge
Maintain a positive, cheerful attitude with customers and team members and promote the store and brand image
Report to work on time and notify Store Manager in advance if late or absent
